languages.text: "Ты хороший солдат, Малгар. Я сообщу о твоем героизме".

traits.locale_text: "Ты хороший солдат, Малгар. Когда буду в штабе, обязательно доложу о твоем героизме".

languages.text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."
languages.original_text: "Ты хороший солдат, Малгар. Я сообщу о твоем героизме".

traits.locale_text: "You're a good trooper, Malgar. I will tell others of your heroism."
"You're a good trooper, Malgar. I will tell others of your heroism."
"You're a good trooper, Malgar. I will commend your heroism."
"You're a good trooper, Malgar. I will commend your heroism."
"You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."
"You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein guter Soldat, Malgar. Ich sorge dafür, dass Euer Heldenmut notiert wird."
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein guter Soldat, Malgar. Ich werde Eure Heldenmut lobend erwähnen."

languages.text: « Vous êtes un bon soldat, Malgar. Je veillerai à ce que votre héroïsme soit dûment reconnu. »
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un bon soldat, Malgar. Je ferai mention de votre héroïsme à votre hiérarchie. »

languages.text: “你是位出色的士兵，马尔加。我会保证人们记得你的英雄事迹。”
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: “你是位出色的士兵，马尔加。你的英雄事迹值得嘉奖。”

languages.text: 「お前はいい隊員だ、マルガー。その英雄ぶりを称えよう」
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: 「君はいい隊員だ、マルガー。その英雄ぶりを称えよう」

languages.text: «Es un buen soldado, Malgar. Me aseguraré de que se tenga en cuenta su heroísmo».
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: «Es un buen soldado, Malgar. Elogiaré su heroísmo».

languages.text: "İyi bir askersin Malgar. Emin ol kahramanlıkların unutulmayacak."
languages.original_text: "You are a good soldier, Malgar. I will see that your heroism is noted."

traits.locale_text: "İyi bir askersin Malgar. Emin ol kahramanlıkların unutulmayacak."
